messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Science.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Some brave soul is going out of his way to grow apples for the crews survival.</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Lots of people have suicided bombed in the VR world, probably some free loot if you play that stuff</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Bridge broken into via emag and antique laser gun stolen! BOYS WE HAVE A TRAITOR</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body:
Antique laser gun stolen.
What could a traitor mean for SS13?
So far it is unclear but what we do know is thta anybody is a target and extreme care should be taken.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">All door leasing to  captain dorms including door to bridge emagged open</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">The library need some new writers, come write down your work and be celebrated as an author today!</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body:
test light wire = RED
Contraband wire = YELLOW
